text:
O Bhai Sharma...Hello Mota Bhai â€¦.!
Bahut gyaan liya patle hone Ka lekin chicken nhi chorna haiâ€¦.. 
You came into our lives from our second semesterâ€¦ and u started talking to you sinceâ€¦ I guess when I asked you for help in MTH 102. Maine Dekha ye Banda judge nhi karta hai and Kuch snjhane bolo to smjha deta haiâ€¦. Hence a kind hearted person in this senseâ€¦..â¤ï¸

Fir aate hai second year â€¦ Hamara padosiâ€¦ Ganda rehne walaâ€¦. Nahane se door door se koi nata nhi â€¦ apni blue wali slippers same theâ€¦ Mai tere table se chillar leta thaâ€¦.. Thodi bahut tond Ka mazaak udaya Uske liye sorry...ğŸ˜ Baki padhai mein chapu, hostel ki activities sambhalne mein chapu...still remember the day when Jayant came to your room for the complaintâ€¦. 
Most importantly the thing I will miss the most "Teri hasi" â€¦ would love to mimic it â€¦. Bahut maza aata tha...sunte hi hasi aati thi â€¦.

Ramu bhaiya ki naukri doosri wing mein lagwane ke liye tujhe Kabhi maaf nhi karunga â€¦. Lekin unko vapas wing mein bulane ke liye Kar doonga ...ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

Hamara bahut badhiya openerâ€¦. I initially judged ki Aniket to padhta hi Hoga ... khelta nhi Hoga â€¦ but then you opened the innings and hit sixes made my day â€¦. 

At the end all the very best for the future â€¦ Mai chai peene aaunga â€¦ Mujhe bhoolna mat â€¦ I am sure I won'tâ€¦. Baki keep progressing in your life â€¦ Stay in touchâ€¦

- Tera Deepanshu..
author: Deepanshu  Katare

text:

Apni Goa wali trip Kabhi nhi bhoolunga though tera scene last mein thoda kharab ho Gaya tha but Baki to kitni mast thi Yaar â€¦â€¦ Aur tera peg banana â€¦. Newton's leke Jana... Baki Tu Dil Ka Bahut mast aadmi hai â€¦.. aur bahut grounded BHIâ€¦. Bs Kuch cheejein chupa leta hai andar Jo fir mujhe baad mein pata chalti hai â€¦â€¦ Baki  Aise hi haste rehâ€¦.. text:
Aur Bhai Chotariyaâ€¦..
Kaisa hai Yaar â€¦.. Mast hi Hoga beâ€¦. Tu hamesha mast rehta hai â€¦ Apni wing Ka sabse young memberâ€¦.. Gaali BHI jab conversations mein deta hai to ek feel Hoti hai usmeâ€¦. Baki ek Bakchod actor, I can remember Jab Mai dramatics club ke audition mein tha and Lokesh ne Bola tha ise BHI group mein le lo â€¦.. and then apan Dono ne mast high voice mein vo skit Kiya tha â€¦.Uske baad apan Drami 1 mein BHI same group mein the â€¦. Ghode bech ke sone wala aadmiâ€¦.Jise ek sutli bomb BHI nhi utha paya â€¦.Har Baar GPL Hoti thi Teri â€¦.Tere pe ye dialogue match karta hai â€¦"Ham koi Mandir Ka ghanta hai BC Jo har koi Baja ke Chala jata hai "

Nareda ko choosne wala aadmiâ€¦.Free ki treat ke liye always ready ..  Aasha karte hai KAL ko hamein BHI doge tum treatsâ€¦.

Finally I wish all the best for you future endeavours...may you achieve all your goals ..targets and whatever you want to achieveâ€¦â€¦ Baki hamein Yaad rakhna Yaar â€¦ Hope you'll not forget meâ€¦..

text:
"Are Varshney sirâ€¦ Long time no seeâ€¦ Acha hua nhi dikhe aapâ€¦" Mere vlog Ka ye dialogue to Yaad hi Hoga tujhe â€¦ Anyways that was a joking reactionâ€¦.sorry for that â€¦

Although there was gap between us in the trip...but you somehow made it funâ€¦.Apna Titos wala dance  .. Jab apan teen pehle pahunch Gaye the â€¦.. And your delaying things will keep you remembered in my mind ki ha ye Chutiya sala jab bus ready hai tab nahane ja Raha hai â€¦. BCâ€¦  agar tum time pe AA jate to shayd Yaad hi nhi rehte â€¦. 

Baki tareef wala paragraph dhoond rahe ho to is memoir ko yahin band Kar doâ€¦. Vo to nhi likhne wala Mai ..ğŸ˜œ

Abe pagal ho kya ...aise nhi hota â€¦. Tum chaapu ho Bhai â€¦ pehle double Dassaâ€¦ Bhai kya dedication tha I can still remember the whole wing sleeping and you just waking to and fro in the wing at night reading and memorising things outâ€¦. fir CSE fir great intern fir great PPO ...afsos you rejected fir decent placement...good that you rejected...ğŸ˜ You deserve way better than that ...Aur bandi BHI hai Bhai ki to â€¦. To an overall great all rounderâ€¦.Baki to Maine explore nhi kiya jyadaâ€¦.like attitude and all type wali cheejeinâ€¦ to no comments on that â€¦. Baki Aapka jyada relation padhai se Raha hai and hamara padhai se relation hi nhi tha shayad isliye jyada discussion nhi huye Apne...And thanks for helping me out in some of the things that I can't jot them down .. but I have memories that you didâ€¦. 

Hope you'll remember me as well after the college and we'll meet up someday somewhereâ€¦ chahe kismat se ya plan Karke â€¦. All the best for all your future endeavours and hope you achieve great heights in lifeâ€¦. And make some great friends like our Wingmates...like me ...ğŸ˜ Bhai treat Lene zarur aaunga Kabhi na Kabhi ....Jo Tumne mujhe abhi tak nhi Di hai....

Katare
author: Deepanshu  Katare

text:
Aur Argal Bhaiâ€¦. Aise hi bulata hu Mai to tujhe â€¦.

Bhai Tum mast bande the yaarâ€¦.Bahut humble... helpful... smiling... groundedâ€¦.Bhai Tumhare sath baat karke Lagta tha ki ha Bhai Kuch to connection Acha sa hai apnaâ€¦.ek vo feeling rehti thi ache ...dost wali Jaise Apne past incidents same same type hoâ€¦..

Apan Dramatics mein pehli Baar mile the vo BHI Mime wale dinâ€¦.Apan mast practice karte the â€¦ Vo mooh fulane wali...fir pichkane wali â€¦. Mujhe ache se yaD hai â€¦. Fir vo tera Chor banne wala character jisme Tu stage pe bahut jyada frequency as dham dham dham dham dham karta thaâ€¦.. alag hi feel hai Bhai â€¦. Apan vo make-up ke baad photo khichwate...Bhai vo daur hi alag thaâ€¦.

Iske baad Maine to Dramatics Chor Diya ..fir apan bahut jyada to nhi hi Mileâ€¦. Shayad tune Dramatics ke liye Kuch to help maangi thi â€¦. Shayad bande leke aao wali ...Yaad nhi â€¦.

Uske baad Yaad aata hai apnj mechanical ki classes aur vo tera Red Jacket ya shayad Red bagâ€¦.dono mein se Kuch to red tha â€¦ aur Tu mere samne wale rows mein baitha tha â€¦.. Kabhi kabaar padhai ki baat Kar Lete the ...lab report help vagarhâ€¦..

Uske baad to CDAP hi Yaad aata hai â€¦. Aur vo stand up comedy Jisme MERI fat rahi thiâ€¦.But Maza Aaya Ratnesh Bhai Tumne us din bulaya â€¦. Aur hamne perform Kiya â€¦..

Ant mein yehi kahengey ki aise hi muskurate rahiye.. haste rahiye aur Jeevan ke har department mein chaapte rahiyeâ€¦ aur ha most importantly apna ye character maintain rakhiye â€¦. Aap bahut mast bande hai â€¦  Aasha karte hai jaldi hi Apan kahin Ka kahin Milenge...Kisi na Kisi mod pe â€¦.

Tera Deepanshu Bhai â€¦.
author: Deepanshu  Katare

text:
Yo Guptaâ€¦ Tum alag hi ho Bhai .. bahut alag ...MATLAB alag ho bas ..ha ho...thode to alag hi hoâ€¦. Bas aise hi memoir ki lines badha Raha hu Bhai aur Kuch nhi â€¦..

Anyways I can totally remember your first year face though you were a kind of introvert so we haven't talked much in first year also vo baat alag hai Kuch tha hi nhi common neither Maine kahin Kuch alag Kiya tha. .. But I found that on mess table Animesh Asking me .. ye Gandu jaisa nhi Lagta Karke and they started calling you Gandu as nicknameâ€¦.(Sorry but us din Galti se mere muh se nikal gayi Ref- Going back from gym) â€¦.Tab tum mujhe bahut jyada seedhe lagte the Bhai â€¦ And aisa Lagta tha Baki Wingmates tumhe bully Kar rahe haiâ€¦.ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£

Uske baad apan Dono sath mein Udghosh mein the ...vo mujhe Yaad hai ... Marathon ke liye Gaye the ..and all...

Fir in second year you apni bahut jyada BAAT to nhi huyi hai â€¦. Though you were funny all the time â€¦ tera kanpuriya style bahut unique tha â€¦ and mast tha Bhai ...abhi BHI kaan mein awaaz goonjti hai tere accent mein "Abe topa hi ho Kaâ€¦" â€¦
Aur tera baat Karne Ka style â€¦"Abe Katare! Ek baat batao kiâ€¦"

Mai to jyada nhi janta tha tereko but sala trip har bande ke parde khol deti hai ...Sale haramkhor kya Moody aadmi hai be Tu ...alag hi level â€¦ but chill hai isliye thoda Khaas BHI hai â€¦. 

Baki Bhai chaapte to Tu rehta hi hai . Udghosh hi ya acads .. intern ho ya placement aur ab bas gharwalon ko raazi Karna hai...I have full confidence and all wishes from me ki usme BHI Tu chaap degaâ€¦. 

Finally lots and lots of wishes from me for all your future endeavoursâ€¦. Aise hi chaapte rehâ€¦. Aur apna fun nature Banaye Rakh ...vo bahut mast cheej hai â€¦  Goa mein tere sath Maza Aaya tha.   Fir chahe vo teri car skills Ka Maza udana hi kyun na ho ...but overall Maza Aaya tha ..thanks for being there in the tripâ€¦.Baki abhi Mera ek Saal aur hai â€¦.aur tera WFH â€¦ Mai Milne aaunga tere Ghar â€¦ Hope ham future mein mile â€¦.Tu mujhe Shaadi mein BHI bulayega...and all â€¦. Finally Stay_In_Touch
